page.title: 08Farming at Hittisleigh
page.content: Methods vary from the very modern; crop spraying by helicopter, purpose- built buildings and large machinery, to farms that have hardly changed in the last 50 years, with traditional cob buildings, ancient tractors and machinery. Most are family farms run by husband and wife, brothers, father and son, and only 2 employ any other labour on a permanent basis. Self-employed agricultural contractors are used when needed.
